item.title: Do you really need a copilot?
item.description:
Idiots set trends in motion

Over the past few months, a sizable fraction of my developer peers have taken to AI tools in their programming workflows. When I was beckoned from under a rock by the light of day, I was taken aback by this rising wave of vibe coding.

Some of my peers claim AI tools to be phenomenal for frontend technologies like React and NextJS. The selling point? Context aware autocompletes and agent mode.
